devdoc.author: Arrakis Finance
devdoc.details: DO NOT ADD STATE VARIABLES - APPEND THEM TO ArrakisV2RouterStorage

params.params_: AddLiquidityData struct containing data for adding liquidity

returns.amount0: amount of token0 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.amount1: amount of token1 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.sharesReceived: amount of ArrakisV2 tokens transferred to `receiver`

params.params_: AddLiquidityPermit2Data struct containing data for adding liquidity

returns.amount0: amount of token0 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.amount1: amount of token1 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.sharesReceived: amount of ArrakisV2 tokens transferred to `receiver`

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.params_: RemoveLiquidityData struct containing data for withdrawals

returns.amount0: actual amount of token0 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`
returns.amount1: actual amount of token1 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`

params.params_: RemoveLiquidityPermit2Data struct containing data for withdrawals

returns.amount0: actual amount of token0 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`
returns.amount1: actual amount of token1 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.params_: SwapAndAddData struct containing data for swap

returns.amount0: amount of token0 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.amount1: amount of token1 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.sharesReceived: amount of ArrakisV2 tokens transferred to `receiver`

params.params_: SwapAndAddPermit2Data struct containing data for swap

returns.amount0: amount of token0 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.amount1: amount of token1 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.sharesReceived: amount of ArrakisV2 tokens transferred to `receiver`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: ArrakisV2 Public Vault Router

addLiquidity((uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: addLiquidity adds liquidity to ArrakisV2 vault of interest (mints LP tokens)

addLiquidityPermit2(((uint256,uint256,ui.notice: addLiquidityPermit2 adds liquidity to ArrakisV2 vault of interest (mints LP tokens)

removeLiquidity((uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: removeLiquidity removes liquidity from vault and burns LP tokens

removeLiquidityPermit2(((uint256,uint256.notice: removeLiquidityPermit2 removes liquidity from vault and burns LP tokens

swapAndAddLiquidity(((bytes,uint256,uint.notice: swapAndAddLiquidity transfer tokens to and calls ArrakisV2Router

swapAndAddLiquidityPermit2((((bytes,uint.notice: swapAndAddLiquidityPermit2 transfer tokens to and calls ArrakisV2Router

updateSwapExecutor(address).notice: updates address of ArrakisV2SwaprExecutor used by this contract

userdoc.notice: Smart contract for adding and removing liquidity from Public ArrakisV2 vaults
